recipe.title: Sangria II
ingredients: 1/3 cup superfine granulated sugar, or to taste
2 cups chilled seltzer or club soda
instructions: In a bowl, combine wine, cognac, Triple Sec and sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Stir in the orange and lemon slices and chill for 1 hour.Transfer to a punch bowl, stir in seltzer, and add a block of ice or ice cubes.
